0111000110010010 0100111001111000 0 -> sum: 1100000000001010, cout: 0
1101100010010110 0011110100101000 1 -> sum: 0001010110111111, cout: 1
0100011110001110 1011001110000010 1 -> sum: 1111101100010001, cout: 0
1111111110011110 1110011001010000 1 -> sum: 1110010111101111, cout: 1
1000100101110010 1111111000110101 0 -> sum: 1000011110100111, cout: 1
0101011000110000 0001010001011010 0 -> sum: 0110101010001010, cout: 0
